archimate:ArchimateModel.name: ASPICE
archimate:ArchimateModel.purpose:
This model contains process descriptions from the Automotive SPICE Standard v.3.1. All views are contained in the "Views" section (selectable in the model tree on the left side). Model structure maintains the standard structro
Source of information for this model is Automotive SPICE Standard v.3.1 (http://www.automotivespice.com/fileadmin/software-download/AutomotiveSPICE_PAM_31.pdf)
Created by: Alexander Efremov (alexander.efremoff@gmail.com)
